title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Conventional and Emerging Contaminants: Persistence and health hazards of contaminants in ecosystem: agricultural and industrial perspective.Water Flow and Contaminant Transport: Flow and Transport Equations, Non-reactive Solute Transport, Sorption Processes, Transformations Processes.Flow and Transport Modeling: Physical and Analytical Modeling, Numerical Modeling, Method of Moments, Field studies: Borden CFB and AgFE field study.
